Package com.atakmap.android.data

Class URIContentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.data.URIContentManager
  • public class URIContentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager for defining content actions based on a URI Similar to the Import Manager framework but with remote content support

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      • getHandler

        public URIContentHandler getHandler​(java.lang.String tool,
                                    java.lang.String uri)
        Given a content URI and optional tool name, create or obtain a content handler
        Parameters:
        tool - Tool name (may be null if N/A)
        uri - Content URI
        Returns:
        URI content handler or null if not supported
